modName: Up to 10 Magelights at the same time
summary: You Can Use up to 10 Magelight balls at the same time, Time for Magelight and Candlelight is set to last for 5 min Optional File: Can summon up to 10 Magelight Balls at the same time. Vanilla duration
descriptionHtml:
You Can Use up to 10 Magelight balls at the same time, Time for Magelight and Candlelight is set to last for 5 min. Optional File: Can summon up to 10 Magelight Balls at the same time. Vanilla duration

Like the mod? Show some love and Edorse/vote :) 

No need asking for permission to Translate this mod to other language. 
Just make a link to this original file. (and a little thanks on your site would be nice ;) )
author: KennyBall
